1.content:
you browse deviantart to look at some sexy artwork and you stumble upon Gillpanda's fursona and you fall instantly in love. http://d.facdn.net/art/gillpanda/1262757...

you leave a comment on gillpanda's profile that states "gill your fursona is so beautiful I wish she was real so I can date her" then gill reply's by saying "its possible to date her meet in this private chatroom www.gillpandachat.com" and you do so. Then gill appeared on web camera "hi so why do want to date my fursona?" then you reply by saying "she's beautiful and I think I'm in love I cant stop thinking about her and what do you mean by its possible to date her?" "because I recently got this top secret machine that can bring cartoon characters into the real world" "BULLSHIT!!! its not possible to bring 2 dementional art into the 3 dementional world" it works seriously look" then all of a sudden gill's fursona comes on the screen and said "hi so you think I'm beautiful?" "oh come on anyone with a brainstem can figure out that she's actually a visual effect" then gill's fursona replies "oh yeah could a visual effect do this?" then she got up and jumped out of the computer screen and went into your room and stood next to you "THATS IMPOSSIBLE THIS DEFIES THE LAWS OF PHYSICS" "are you mad" "hell no" you reply "this is the greatest day of my life" gill replies "cool so where do you want to go first?
1.title: meeting gillpanda

"oh go not this again" said gill "whats wrong" you say "I like it alot but its very stereotypical for someone to ask me to watch a movie like this" "sorry" "its ok sure we can watch.... even though its not romantic" so what do you do next?
